title: Spiced stir-fried duck
ingredients: ['400 g (14 oz) boneless duck breasts', '2 tsp five-spice powder', '100 g (3½ oz) button onions, thinly sliced', '4 small celery sticks, thinly sliced, plus a few leaves to garnish', '1 large firm pear, peeled, cored and diced', '1 can water chestnuts, about 225 g, drained and sliced', '1 tbsp clear honey', '3 tbsp rice vinegar or sherry vinegar', '1 tbsp light soy sauce', '200 g (7 oz) pak choy, shredded', '150 g (5½ oz) bean sprouts']
